{{cpp/io/basic_ios/navbar}}
{{ddcl|
std::locale imbue( const std::locale&amp; loc );
}}

Replaces the current locale. Effectively calls {{c|ios_base::imbue(loc)}} and if there is an associated stream buffer ({{c|rdbuf() !{{=}} 0}}), then calls {{c|rdbuf()-&gt;pubimbue(loc)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|loc|the new locale}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The previous locale, as returned by {{c|ios_base::imbue(loc)}}.

{{cpp/impldef exception}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;locale&gt;
#include &lt;sstream&gt;
 
int main()
{
    std::istringstream iss;
    iss.imbue(std::locale("en_US.UTF8"));
    
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "Current locale: " &lt;&lt; iss.getloc().name() &lt;&lt; '\n';
    
    iss.imbue(std::locale());
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "Global locale : " &lt;&lt; iss.getloc().name() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
Current locale: en_US.UTF8
Global locale : C
}}
